db:abstract.db:para: An API for accessing NFC Forum Tags.

db:article.db:para: An API for accessing NFC Forum Tags.

db:listitem.db:para: The QNdefFilter class provides a filter for matching NDEF messages.
The QNdefFilter::Record struct contains the information about a filter record.
The QNdefMessage class provides an NFC NDEF message.
The QNdefNfcIconRecord class provides an NFC MIME record to hold an icon.
The QNdefNfcSmartPosterRecord class provides an NFC RTD-SmartPoster.
The QNdefNfcTextRecord class provides an NFC RTD-Text.
The QNdefNfcUriRecord class provides an NFC RTD-URI.
The QNdefRecord class provides an NFC NDEF record.
The QNearFieldManager class provides access to notifications for NFC events.
The QNearFieldTarget class provides an interface for communicating with a target device.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Qt NFC C++ API enables an application to access NFC Forum Tags.

db:section.db:title: Using the Module
db:section.db:para: Using a Qt module requires linking against the module library, either directly or through other dependencies. Several build tools have dedicated support for this, including CMake and qmake.

db:section.db:title: Building with CMake
db:section.db:para: Use the find_package() command to locate the needed module components in the Qt6 package:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS Nfc) target_link_libraries(mytarget PRIVATE Qt::Nfc)
